query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Mentre che li occhi per la fronda verde 2 ficcava ïo sì come far suole 3 chi dietro a li uccellin sua vita perde,
query.error: **English:** 1 While my eyes were fixed on the green leaves, 2 as one who loses his life following the birds, 3 my father said to me more than once: "My son,
query.result: 1 Yāvad aham akṣīṇī haritāyām pallavāvalīyām 2 nikṣipya iva, yathā saḥ karoti 3 yaḥ pakṣiṇām anugataḥ svam jīvitam vināśayati,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 lo più che padre mi dicea: «Figliuole, 5 vienne oramai, ché ’l tempo che n’è imposto 6 più utilmente compartir si vuole».
query.error: **English:** 4 come now, for the time that is allotted to us 5 should be spent more usefully."
query.result: 4 pitamahaḥ mama punaḥ punaḥ avocat: "He putrā, 5 āgaccha idānīm, yataḥ kālaḥ yaḥ asmābhiḥ prāptaḥ 6 adhikaṃ upayuktarūpeṇa vibhajyate."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Io volsi ’l viso, e ’l passo non men tosto, 8 appresso i savi, che parlavan sìe, 9 che l’andar mi facean di nullo costo.
query.error: **English:** 7 I turned my face, and my steps no less swiftly, 8 following the wise men, who spoke so gently, 9 that they made my journey seem effortless.
query.result: 7 Aham vaktram avaivartam, ca padam na hrasīyas, 8 paścāt tajjñāninaḥ, ye evam abhaṇan, 9 ye yānam mama akurvan na kiñcid mūlyam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Ed ecco piangere e cantar s’udìe 11 ‘Labïa mëa, Domine’ per modo 12 tal, che diletto e doglia parturìe.
query.error: **English:** 10 And behold, weeping and singing were heard, 11 “Labia mea, Domine” in such a way 12 that it produced delight and sorrow.
query.result: 10 Tataśca ruditam eva gītam ca śrutam 11 “Labia mea, Domine” iti prakāreṇa 12 yena sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca sambabhūvatuḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 «O dolce padre, che è quel ch’i’ odo?», 14 comincia’ io; ed elli: «Ombre che vanno 15 forse di lor dover solvendo il nodo».
query.error: **English:** 13 "O sweet father, what is that which I hear?" 14 I began; and he: "Shades who go 15 perhaps absolving themselves of their debt."
query.result: 13 "He bhagavan pita, kim etad yaḥ aham śṛṇomi?" 14 ārabdhaḥ aham; sa ca: "Chāyāḥ yāḥ gacchanti 15 svakarmabandhanāt svatantratām prāpnuvanti vā."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Sì come i peregrin pensosi fanno, 17 giugnendo per cammin gente non nota, 18 che si volgono ad essa e non restanno,

query.result: 16 Yathā cintāparāḥ yatrikāḥ kurvanti, 17 agamyamārgaṃ prāpya, 18 ye tasminn eva mārge āvartante na ca tiṣṭhanti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 così di retro a noi, più tosto mota, 20 venendo e trapassando ci ammirava 21 d’anime turba tacita e devota.
query.error: **English:** 19 so behind us, moving somewhat faster, 20 came and passed us a crowd of silent and devout souls, 21 wondering who we were.
query.result: 19 evam asmākaṃ paścād āgacchatī, kincit tvaritatarā, 20 ātmānaḥ pradarśayanti, asmān atiśayati ca 21 jīvānāṃ samūho mūkaḥ śraddhāluś ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Ne li occhi era ciascuna oscura e cava, 23 palida ne la faccia, e tanto scema 24 che da l’ossa la pelle s’informava.
query.error: **English:** 22 In her eyes each one was dark and hollow, 23 pale in the face, and so wasted 24 that the skin clung to her bones.
query.result: 22 Netrayoḥ sāparā pakṣmāṇi nīlāni ca, 23 Palitānanā ca tasyāḥ kṛśā ca tathā, 24 Yathāsthibhyaḥ tvacaivāsya nirviśeṣā babhūva.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Non credo che così a buccia strema 26 Erisittone fosse fatto secco, 27 per digiunar, quando più n’ebbe tema.
query.error: **English:** 25 I do not believe that Erysichthon was made so lean 26 and withered, when he had the greatest fear of fasting.
query.result: 25 Na manye tathā tvaci-kṣāmaḥ 26 Ṛṣir āsīt ṛṣabhaḥ kṣudhārttaḥ, 27 Yathā bhayāt kṣudhāyāḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Io dicea fra me stesso pensando: ‘Ecco 29 la gente che perdé Ierusalemme, 30 quando Maria nel figlio diè di becco!’
query.error: **English:** 28 I said to myself, thinking: ‘Behold 29 the people who lost Jerusalem, 30 when Mary gave birth to her son!’
query.result: 28 Aham ātmānam āhaṃ manyamānaḥ: ‘Idam 29 janaṃ yaḥ Yerūśālemamajahāra, 30 yadā Mārīyā putrātmajam ajījanat!’

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Parean l’occhiaie anella sanza gemme: 32 chi nel viso de li uomini legge ‘omo’ 33 ben avria quivi conosciuta l’emme.
query.error: **English:** 31 Their eye sockets seemed like rings without gems: 32 whoever reads ‘man’ in the face of men 33 would have recognized the letter ‘M’ here.
query.result: 31 Tेषāṃ netrāṇi maṇirahitāni valayā iva āsan: 32 yaḥ puruṣasya mukhe ‘puruṣaḥ’ iti paṭhati 33 sa atra ‘ma’ varṇamapi jānīyāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 34 Kaḥ viśvasyed yadi gandho’py ekasya phalasyaiva 35 icchām janayati, na jñāyate katham? 36 Tathāpy ekasya jalasya gandhena
